text: WTHM-LP is a Christian News/Talk formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Ravenswood, West Virginia, serving the Ravenswood/Ripley area. WTHM-LP is owned and operated by Mountain State Community Radio, Inc. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2015 establishments in West Virginia THM-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 THM-LP THM-LP
title: WTHM-LP
